import React from 'react'; import profile_pic from '../images/profile_pic.png'; import 'animate.css'; import { useInView } from "react-intersection-observer"; const About = () => { const [ref, inView] = useInView({ threshold: 0 }) return (

About Me

Web developer who loves to transform ideas into reality using code. I enjoy being the bridge between engineering and design, and feel right at home as a front end engineer. I'm experienced in developing and designing products for the web, from simple landing pages to creating custom websites with ReactJs, Node, Express, Mongo, and PostgreSQL.

) } export default About;
